## Installing plotly

```{r}
# install.packages("plotly")
library("plotly")
```


## [Getting Started with Plotly for R ](https://plot.ly/r/getting-started/)

```{r}
library(plotly)
p <- plot_ly(midwest, x = ~percollege, color = ~state, type = "box")
p
```
